name: Hidden In Plain Sight (itch) (SkylerZedd)
description:
This is a passion-project. I started on this project in January, and began closed testing in February. Now, 10 days after I started the closed testing, I've switched up to do open testing, so that I can get get more feedback.

The game is a cipher-based puzzle game that explores different types of ciphers and how to decrypt them. The difficulty ranges from easy to hard and complicated. Using your creativity and pattern-observing skills is important to recognise and crack complex and unusual ciphers. The game gives the player multiple tools to proceed in the game, and the player should never have to use third-party tools to solve puzzles.

This game is first and foremost designed for mobile. You can download it from GooglePlayStore here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SkyCreations.HiddenInPlainSight
Kickstarter can be found here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/skylerzedd/hidden-in-plain-sight-1
